name: Penguins of Madagascar
overview: Help Skipper, Kowalski, Rico and Private defeat Dr. Octavius Brines plan for world domination! Game Features : -Go on stealth operations in top-secret locations from the movie and beyond. -Master each Penguins unique skill, like Ricos Explosive Slide and Skippers Stun Slap. -Solve puzzles, crack codes and hunt for Cheezy Dibbles!
